name: Santa Vs Gifts
description:
Let's play amazing endless Santa Vs Gifts Game for kids and adults. It's amazing adventure game. Tap to play and tap to jump in the scene. Collect the much of possible gifts and create your best score. It's amazing action game for Christmas.

Features:
=======
- Beautiful Christmas Theme.
- Easy to play.
- Endless Game Play.
- Supported IOS 11.

So why are you waiting? Download Now....
